org.livingdoc.repositories.confluence

Class ConfluenceRepository

  • org.livingdoc.repositories.confluence.ConfluenceRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentRepository

    public class ConfluenceRepository
implements DocumentRepository

    This implementation of a DocumentRepository uses a Confluence server to get the Documents from. The remote Confluence server can be configured in the livingdoc.yml config section of the repository.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfluenceRepository

        public ConfluenceRepository(@NotNull
                            java.lang.String name,
                            @NotNull
                            ConfluenceRepositoryConfig config)

        This implementation of a DocumentRepository uses a Confluence server to get the Documents from. The remote Confluence server can be configured in the livingdoc.yml config section of the repository.

    • Method Detail

      • getDocument

        @NotNull
public Document getDocument(@NotNull
                                     java.lang.String documentIdentifier)

        Get a confluence page as Document. This method uses the xml representation of the confluence page.

        Parameters:
        documentIdentifier - the DocumentID of the confluence page

      • getDocumentIdAndVersion

        @NotNull
public org.livingdoc.repositories.confluence.ConfluenceRepository.ConfluenceIdentifier getDocumentIdAndVersion(@NotNull
                                                                                                                        java.lang.String documentIdentifier)

        Reads the DocumentId and the Page Version from an documentIdentifier and returns it.

        Parameters:
        documentIdentifier - The raw DocumentIdentifier containing ID and Version
        Returns:
        A Pair containing the Confluence Page ID and the Page Version
